title: Auto-connect to a wifi network turns itself off
content:
2 wifi networks at home. Select one > settings > advanced > Turn on Auto-connect > leave wifi settings > immediately go back to that wifi settings > advanced > Auto-connect has turned off! Endless fun turning on manually to connect. Will not permanently auto-connect. 

Also have to reboot regularly to connect to internet despite wifi connecting (all other devices connect to wifi and internet).
